name: Everfine LED Lamp Test Results File
summary: Learn about .HAAS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: HAAS files are typically created by HAAS spectroradiometers but may also be created by the Everfine HAAS Suite, which is available for Windows. The suite is also the only program available to open HAAS files. You most likely will only come across this type of file if you use Everfine measuring instruments and are an LED lighting professional.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
